items.title: Wash your walls with 64 preset designs or draw your own with Govee’s RGBIC Cylinder Floor Lamp at a $120 annual low (Reg. $170)
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is now offering its RGBIC Cylinder Floor Lamp back for $119.99 shipped. You’d usually have to shell out $170 for this lamp at full price, though we have seen frequent falls over 2025 to $130 and one drop to this same rate back during July’s Prime Day event. That Prime Day pricing is coming back around for the second time this year now, giving you a $50 markdown to the second-lowest price we have tracked – just $10 above the all-time low last seen in July 2024.

items.title: Hardwire Schumacher’s 50A Level 2 EV wall charger indoors or outdoors while at a new $350 low (Reg. $450+)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Schumacher 50A Hardwired Level 2 EV Wall Charger at $349.99 shipped. Since July we’ve seen it keeping at $450 at full price, which is also when we last saw a discount, with Prime Day having taken the cost down to $399, and was only ever beaten out by a $390 rate from October 2024 Prime Day. The deal we’re seeing here takes things lower than ever as the 22% markdown is cutting $100 off the going rate and landing it at a new all-time low price. Keep in mind that this is a hardwired station, with the more flexible variant also currently seeing a discount to $414 right now, down from $500.

more…

items.title: Amazon’s mini ceramic space heater falls to $17 Prime shipped in a variety of colors
items.summary:
Amazon Basics Mini Ceramic Space Heater

Buy for $17 (Reg. $18.50)

What we love

The weather has really cooled off in my neck of the woods and it’s getting cold enough that in the near future my furnace may kick on at night. This also means that certain areas of a home or office may feel cooler than you’d like, and a small little heater like this can come in handy. It measures roughly 6 by 6 by 3 inches and weighs in at only 1.4 pounds. Total power output is 500W, which means it won’t cost a fortune to run for hours at a time either.

more…

items.title: Power your gear when abroad with Anker’s Nano 5-port travel adapter at $20 (Save 23%)
items.summary:
Anker Nano 5-Port Travel Adapter

Buy for $20 (Reg. $26)

What we love

These days we rely on loads of tech each and every day, so when traveling it can be a bit intimidating to think about going somewhere that doesn’t have the plugs you’re used to at home. Anker aims to help with its Nano adapter which offers four types of outlet connectors. This unit can keep you going in places like Japan, Europe, Asia, the UK, Ireland, Austrailia, China, and more. It offers up an AC outlet alongside USB-A ports as well as two Type-C outputs.

more…

items.title: Clear up to 1.5 miles of weeds with this Greenworks 48V (2x24V) 15-inch string trimmer and two batteries at a new $91 low
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Greenworks 48V (2 x 24V) 15-inch Cordless String Trimmer with two 2.0Ah batteries and dual-port charger for $91.19 shipped, which matches the pricing directly from the brand’s website. While it carries a $160 MSRP, we more often see it priced around $120 at Amazon, with discounts over the years having only gone as low as $96, which we last saw for an extended period in April through May. Today’s deal beats out all that have come before, though, with the 43% markdown here cutting $69 off the MSRP tag for a new all-time low.

more…

items.title: Looking for a super-affordable officially licensed Switch 2 camera? This mini model just hit the $35 Amazon low
items.summary:
Not all USB cameras work on Switch 2 properly and the official one Nintendo makes is going to be the best option for full functionality. But if you’re just looking to get your face on that tiny little on-screen display during gameplay, something like the much more affordable and officially-licensed HORI USB Camera for Nintendo Switch 2 might work while it’s down at the $34.99 all-time low – shipping is free for Prime members or in orders over $35. 

more…

items.title: This already-affordable device checks blood oxygen and pulse rate, now just $8 for Prime members
items.summary:
Vibeat Blood Oxygen and Pulse Rate Monitor

Buy for $8 (Reg. $10)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

If you have someone in your family that would like to tap into blood oxygen and pulse rate readings, this affordable little device can do the trick at just $8 for Prime members. Yes, these are features that select Apple Watch models can already tackle, but not everyone owns or wants to wear an Apple Watch. This little device can sit in the medicine cabinet and be used whenever needed with no need to wear anything all day long.

items.summary:
S&T 11.5-inch Microfiber Cleaning Cloths (100-pack)

Buy for $23 (Reg. $30)

What we love

This type of cleaning cloth is a staple of our house. We use them for all sorts of things, and they tend to last for years. Since they are microfiber, you don’t have to worry about them being abrasive on your gear either. With 100 of these at your disposal, chances are high that this is a one and done purchase that will have you set for quite a while.

items.title: Govee’s Bluetooth hygrometer can track temperature trends for up to 2 years, now $11
items.summary:
Govee Bluetooth Digital Hygrometer

Buy for $11 (Reg. $13)

What we love

I have six different temperature sensors spread throughout my home so I can accurately tweak vents and keep things feeling the same throughout my home. Sure, it’s easy to feel when there’s a major issue, but even then, it’s hard to tell how much progress you’re making and a hygrometer like this can help. I like that it can be paired with the Govee app and provide up to 2 years of historical temperature data.

items.summary:

The new flagship tablets are now available for purchase straight from Samsung with some notable trade-in discounts that can knock up to $800 off the price of the new tablets alongside as much as $150 in FREE storage upgrades. This tailor-made case aims to streamline the travel process with room for Starlink Mini and its accessories.

items.title: GoPro is teasing the MAX 2 action cam, but this deal on the 2025 MAX 360 model is too good to pass up at $120 off
items.summary:
GoPro has begun teasing its upcoming MAX 2 360 action cam, suggesting it could arrive sooner rather than later. But while that’s still on the horizon, you might want to jump in and snag the 2025 refreshed model of the original GoPro MAX at $249 shipped. Regularly $350, this updated model first dropped to $249 back in July before climbing back up to its full price. Today’s deal marks the return of that all-time low with a $120 discount, making this a great time to cash in if you missed out on the previous offer and don’t want to pay the full price for the new unit that’ll likely debut in the coming months. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: This new Baseus wall charger debuts with a detachable 10K Qi2 MagSafe power bank for on-the-go charging
items.summary:
Baseus is stepping into the spotlight at IFA alongside Anker, UGREEN, and Aukey with a new charger called the EnerGeek GT01. This clever solution pairs a 10,000mAh MagSafe power bank with a wall adapter that sports foldable prongs. The two snap together for a compact all-in-one unit, or you can detach the battery for portable charging while leaving a 27W USB-C adapter plugged into the outlet for your other devices. It’s one of the most versatile charging units out there, and it has plenty of other neat features which you can learn more about below.

items.title: Last day: Time is running out to score up to $350 in FREE credit on Google’s new Pixel 10 and 10 Pro/XL
items.summary:
Google unleashed all of its next-generation gear last month, and there is now less than 48 hours left to take advantage of the deals. While it wouldn’t be surprising to see retailers like Amazon keep their hundreds in bonus credit offers rolling, the official Google Store does say its Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL promotion “ends 9/4” and that means the clock might be ticking to take advantage here.
